title: “Death and the Maiden”
description:
Jason and David dive into episode 6 of Foundation, “Death and the Maiden.” They explore the big reveal that comes to Salvor in a vision, the mounting panic taking hold of Brother Dawn, and Luminism—a religion that suddenly poses a threat to Empire. 

This is an Apple TV+ podcast, produced by Pineapple Street Studios.

https://apple.co/-Foundation-
